text: Ara amara apanara purbe ye rasula kimba nabi prerana karechi [1], tadera ke'u yakhana'i (ohira kichu) tila'oyata kareche [2], takhana'i sayatana tadera tila'oyate (kichu) niksepa kareche, kintu sayatana ya niksepa kare allah‌ ta bidurita karena [3]. Tarapara allah‌ tamra ayatasamuhake supratisthita karena ebam allah‌ sarbajna, prajnamaya
